title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-markdown-extensions
author: oeyoews
name: Neotw Markdown Extensions
readme:
## Neotw Markdown Extensions
## Markdown-it Plugins ## Pangu 當你凝視著 bug，bug 也凝視著你 ### SmartArrows --> → <-- ← <--> ↔ ==> ⇒ <== ⇐ <==> ⇔ ### Emoji * :tada: :smile: :cat: ### Abbr * Tiddlywiki * 太微 ## 测试 ### Link Support * [[Readme|$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-markdown-extensions/readme]] Link(include double brackets) * [Readme](#$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-markdown-extensions/readme) ### 段落 这是一段普通的文本。 段落之间需要空行。 换行需要使用 `
` 或者加上两个空格。 字体可以使用 *斜体* 或者 **粗体** 或者 ***斜粗体***。 删除线可以使用 ~~删除线~~。 ### 无序列表 - 列表项 1 - 列表项 2 - 列表项 3 ### 有序列表 1. 列表项 1 2. 列表项 2 3. 列表项 3 ### 引用 > 这是一段引用的文本。 ### 行内代码 这是一段代码：`print("Hello world!")` ### 代码块 ```js console.log('hi') ```
### Better render * (c) * (tm) * (r) * ????? * !!!!!! * ...... ### Macro Support ### image ``` ![http image](https://neotw.oeyoewl.top/favicon.ico) ``` ![http image](https://neotw.oeyoewl.top/favicon.ico) ``` ![alt text](<#tom.png>) ``` ### underline ++inserted text++ ### mark ==dmeo== X^2^ ### table |Left Aligned |Centered |Right Aligned | |:--- | :---: | ---:| |apple |bat |candle | ### footnote Here's a simple footnote,[^1] and here's a longer one.[^bignote] [^1]: This is the first footnote. [^bignote]: Here's one with multiple paragraphs and code. Indent paragraphs to include them in the footnote. `{ my code }` Add as many paragraphs as you like. *[Tiddlywiki]: TiddlyWiki is a unique non-linear personal web notebook that allows users to create, organize, and share content in a highly flexible and customizable manner. It is an open-source wiki software written in JavaScript and designed to run entirely in the web browser. TiddlyWiki is known for its simplicity, portability, and powerful features. *[太微]: Chinese Name of Tiddlywiki https://pkmer.cn/Pkmer-Docs/10-obsidian/obsidian%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82/css-%E7%89%87%E6%AE%B5/obsidian%E6%A0%B7%E5%BC%8F-%E8%87%AA%E5%AE%9A%E4%B9%89%E5%BE%85%E5%8A%9E%E5%9B%BE%E6%A0%87/
